about.description: Aco Gjorgjievski is the founder and CEO of Shifter. With over 30 years of professional experience, Aco spent 15 years at Nestl√©, where he served as Executive Director (BEO) for the Adriatic region, covering seven markets, and was a member of the board for the EMENA region. Through these experiences, Aco gained deep knowledge and practical expertise in business and leadership development. In 2020, he founded Shifter with a clear mission: to share his expertise with family businesses in Macedonia and the region. The goal is to encourage sustainable growth, corporate structure, and help them reach their full potential.
